title: git-annex: failed to create OS thread: Cannot allocate memory
body:
```
% datalad get inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz
get(notneeded): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz (file) [already present]
Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'get', '--json', '-J8', '--json-progress', '--', 'sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz', 'templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat', 'sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz'] under '/home/data/psyinf/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm'. Exit code=1. out= err=git-annex: failed to create OS thread: Cannot allocate memory
git-annex: failed to create OS thread: Cannot allocate memory
```

But

```
% cd inputs/mri_xfm
% git annex get sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz                                   
get sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz (from mddatasrc...) 
(checksum...) ok
get templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat (from mddatasrc...) 
(checksum...) ok
get sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz (from mddatasrc...) 
(checksum...) ok
(recording state in git...)
% datalad get inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz  
get(notneeded): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz (file) [already present]
get(notneeded): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz (file) [already present]
get(notneeded): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm/templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat (file) [already present]
get(notneeded): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz (file) [already present]
action summary:
  get (notneeded: 4)
```

and after a drop (one file has no copied, so that is OK):

```
% datalad drop inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz  
[WARNING] Running drop resulted in stderr output: git-annex: drop: 1 failed
 
[ERROR  ] unsafe; Could only verify the existence of 0 out of 1 necessary copies; Rather than dropping this file, try using: git annex move; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin); (Use --force to override this check, or adjust numcopies.) [drop(/home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz)] 
drop(error): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz (file) [unsafe; Could only verify the existence of 0 out of 1 necessary copies; Rather than dropping this file, try using: git annex move; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin); (Use --force to override this check, or adjust numcopies.)]
drop(ok): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz (file) [checking mddatasrc...]
drop(ok): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm/templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat (file) [checking mddatasrc...]
drop(ok): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz (file) [checking mddatasrc...]

  drop (error: 1, ok: 3)

% datalad get inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz inputs/mri_xfm/templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat inputs/mri_xfm/sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz                                                                                                   
get(notneeded): /home/mih/pd/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/lc_mask/LC_L_mni.nii.gz (file) [already present]
Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'get', '--json', '-J8', '--json-progress', '--', 'sub-01/bold3Tp2/brain.nii.gz', 'templates/grpbold3Tp2/xfm/mni2tmpl_12dof.mat', 'sub-01/bold3Tp2/in_grpbold3Tp2/tmpl2subj_warp.nii.gz'] under '/home/data/psyinf/scratch/coeruleus/inputs/mri_xfm'.
```
